data.title: A universal flu vaccine may be the next big mRNA breakthrough for Moderna, Pfizer
data.description: Pfizer and Moderna are utilizing the same mRNA technology found in Covid-19 vaccines to try to develop a one-time universal flu cure.

data.title: Tumult in tech stocks hurts for now, but may not lead to broader correction
data.description: The Nasdaq and technology slid sharply to start the year, but strategists say that may not be the fate of the broader market as a whole.

data.title: This Dubai restaurant is using tech to stop seafood fraud
data.description: Fraudulent mislabeling of seafood is a widespread problem, but technology can help bring transparency to the seafood industry. In Dubai, beachfront restaurant Rockfish has partnered with online marketplace Seafood Souq to make sure their offerings are traceable and sustainable.

data.title: UBS downgrades Adobe and Salesforce to neutral, says business software growth is slowing
data.description: Enterprise technology spending is showing signs of weakness, according to UBS.

data.title: Macy's shortens store hours as COVID-19 cases surge
data.description: Macy's Inc will reduce its US store hours for the rest of January as it prepares for potential COVID-19 cases among workers with the Omicron variant driving up infections across the United States.
